function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High regional physician density may reduce the number of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Reduced spread of COVID-19 in regions with high physician density","Mitigation":"Ensure equal distribution of physicians to regions with lower density","Technologies":"Healthcare resource allocation systems","People":"Residents of regions with low physician density","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and government"},{"Description":"Population density has a significant impact on infections","Impact":"Higher population density leads to more infections","Mitigation":"Implement targeted hygiene and quarantine measures in densely populated areas","Technologies":"Advanced tracking and monitoring systems for disease control","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Local government and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Negative influence of schoolchildren and childcare rate on infections","Impact":"Increased presence of schoolchildren and infants may lead to higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Implement stricter hygiene and social distancing measures in schools and childcare facilities","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems and educational campaigns","People":"Students, parents, and childcare providers","Owner":"Education authorities and healthcare agencies"}]}
